articles.title: Climate Change May Modify the Risk of Falling Prey to Infectious Diseases - India Education Diary
articles.description: The new study compiled information on the occurrence of over 75 pathogenic microbes across Europe from almost 400 bird- and 40 bat species. Combining data on occurrence with climatic factors revealed that the occurrence of most pathogens was associat
